      • centerAndScale

        public static double[][] centerAndScale(double[][] matrix)
        This function returns a new matrix which is centered and scaled, i.e each the mean is subtracted from each element in the matrix and divided by the matrix standard deviation
        Parameters:
        mu -
        sigma -
        Returns:
        new matrix which is centered (subtracted mean) and scaled (divided with stddev)

      • log

        public static double[][] log(double[][] m1)
        Returns a new matrix with values that are the log of the input matrix
        Parameters:
        matrix -
        Returns:
        same matrix with values log'ed

      • log

        public static double[][] log(double[][] m1,
                             boolean infAsZero)
        Returns a new matrix with values that are the log of the input matrix
        Parameters:
        matrix -
        infAsZero - treat +- Infinity as zero, i.e replaces Infinity with 0.0 if set to true
        Returns:
        same matrix with values log'ed
